text: Yeh rasool hain jin mein say hum ney baaz ko baaz per fazilat di hai inn mein say baaz woh hain jin say Allah Taalaa ney baat cheet ki hai aur baaz kay darjay buland kiye hain aur hum ney essa bin marium ko moajzaat ata farmaye aur rooh-ul-qudus say unn ki taeed ki. Agar Allah Taalaa chahata to unn kay baad aaney walay apney pass daleel aajaney kay baad hegiz aapas mein laraee bhiraee na kertay lekin unn logon ney ikhtilaf kiya inn mein say baaz to momin huye aur baaz kafir aur agar Allah Taalaa chahata to yeh aapas mein na lartay lekin Allah Taalaa jo chahata hai kerta hai
